welcome.s: This is Salty Trivia, the quiz show where you must endure pun after another.
Welcome to Salty Trivia. I’m Candy Barre, the Dr. Phil of this show.
I’m Candy Barre, and you’re about to watch the fifth best damn quiz show you’ve ever seen.
I’m your host, Candy Barre. Hell hath no fury like this quiz show.
If you like putting ranch dressing on filet mignon, you’re gonna love Salty Trivia.
This is Salty Trivia, the quiz show without artificial flavoring—[#3822#]all my sass is real.
Hey, I’m Candy Barre, and my attitude was recently excavated from the Dead Sea.
Welcome to the quiz show where no holds are barred and no Barres are held.[#4685#]I’m Candy Barre.[#6293#]I am very touch-starved. That’s the joke.
This week on Salty Trivia, we’re raising awareness of Comic Sans abuse.[#4084#]Come on, guys.
Welcome to Salty Trivia! Feel free to tweet about this with #SaltyTriviaGame.[#5433#]Or #ThisGameSucks, your choice.
This is Salty Trivia, the quiz show about as orthodox as a Protestant priest.
Welcome to Salty Trivia, the quiz show for nerds who think they’re cool, but usually aren’t.
Welcome to Salty Trivia, the only quiz show[#2206#][almost 4 seconds of silence][#6037#]Let’s get going.
Hi, I’m Candy Barre, and when I’m not practising sick guitar shreds for my band Sinner Wish Mesclun,[#4905#]I’m hosting Salty Trivia.
This is Salty Trivia with Candy Barre,[#2114#]the quiz show where I ask you simple questions[#4233#]in overcomplicated, hopefully funny ways.
I’m Candy Barre, and this is Salty Trivia.[#2333#]Before you ask, yes, I already ate a Snickers. It’s just who I am.
This is Salty Trivia. I’m already bored, so get with it.
Welcome to Salty Trivia with Candy Barre, the quiz show that defenestrates formalities.
This is Salty Trivia. I hope you’re smarter AND funnier than a fifth grader.
Welcome to Salty Trivia, the quiz show where all genders and sexualities are equally attackable.
I’m Candy Barre, and if you want to be a millionaire, go play “Who Wants to Be a Millionaire”.[#4137#]This game’s not that.
I’m your host Candy Barre. The safe word is “psychophysicotherapeutics”.[#4458#]Let’s see how much pain you can endure.
Welcome to Salty Trivia. My friends call me Candy, but you can call me Miss Urushimakka.
Welcome! I’m your host Candy Barre, and I woke up like this.[#4209#]Disheveled.
This is Salty Trivia. And I’m in disbelief that I got all dressed up fancy for this.
[i][calming, Bob Ross voice][/i] I’m so glad you could join me today, but don’t make any happy little accidents now!
I’m your host, Candy Barre, and if I were a tree, I’d be mahogany.[#3984#]What, you thought I’d say sassafras?
This is Salty Trivia. I’m your host, and I’m not actually behind the screen.[#5229#][i][ominously][/i] I’m right behind you.
Welcome to Salty Trivia, where my sass is real but my laughs are fake.[#4017#][i][obviously fake laugh][/i] Hahahahaha.
This is Salty Trivia with Candy Barre,[#2000#]where we have 100% less fart sound effects than our competitors.[#6017#][fart sound effect][#7585#][i][slightly disappointedly][/i] 98.3%.
Welcome to Salty Trivia with Candy Barre, the game we wish Kahoot wishes it were.
You’re about to play Salty Trivia, the game that everybody can play,[#3571#]unless you’re Ramón Acosta from Miami, Florida.[#5874#]F**k off, Ramón! Pay me!
[i][fake British accent][/i] Good afternoon and welcome to Salty Trivia, the game show that simply everyone.[#4743#]]Let’s meet our contestants.
I’m your host Candy Barre, and this is the show where you work to win me money.[#4120#][i](beat)[/i] It isn’t?[#6167#]...Why am I here?
[i](dogs barking loudly)[/i] Welcome to Salty Trivia. I brought three small dogs to watch. Do you mind?
Hey, I’m Candy Barre, and what you’re seeing is a figment of your imagination.[#3794#]You’ve been in a coma for the last several months.[#6240#]Nah, just joshing with you.
I’m Candy Barre, and this is the show where you answer my questions[#3558#]and I silently judge your intelligence or lack thereof.
I’m Candy Barre. Now, you don’t mind if I loudly crunch on tortilla chips while I host this game, do you?[#5036#]You do?[#6088#]Crap.
I’m your host Candy Barre, and learning Fortnite characters’ names is the last thing I’m gonna do.[#6011#]On my to-do list today before I sleep.
I’m Candy Barre, and I’m just gonna tell you beforehand that this will be televised nationally,[#4493#]so don’t say anything overly crude, like “f**k nugget”.[#7436#]Oh, whoops.
This is Salty Trivia with Candy Barre. I’m your host, Candy Barre. It’s in the name, dummy.
Hey, I’m Candy Barre, and I’ve been banned from every Guitar Hero convention in Seattle and Miami.[#5274#]Trust me, you don’t want to hear the full story.
Welcome to Salty Trivia,[#1528#]where the questions are ridiculous like American gun control laws,[#4797#]but the answers are serious like the consequences of said gun control laws.

player_1.s: You’re a lone wolf, I see. Or just alone.
One lonely player? I sure hope you’re just trying out the game before inviting others to play with you.
Playing by yourself? That’s fine, but next time, could you bring a friend who’s more interesting and easy to joke about?
Playing with yourself, I see. Enjoy the satisfaction of doing whatever you want in the privacy of your own room!
I hope you can handle 8 victims’ worth of sass!
[i][angrily][/i]Wait, we set this whole game up only for one person?![#3732#][i][dismissively][/i] Whatever, I’m getting paid per episode.
Did your friends not want to play with you, or do you have no friends?
My fortune cookie this morning said “It’s better to be unhappy alone than unhappy with someone”. So if you feel unhappy here, tough luck, you’re stuck with me for this whole game.
Only one contestant? I can’t focus all my sarcastic mirth onto just one person!
I understand. The world is scary because other people are better than you.
[i][in sultry voice][/i] Okay, just you and me. I hope you have scented candles.[#4134#]No? A bouquet?[#6802#]A bottle of wine?[#8478#]A box of chocolates? ...[#10706#][i](sigh)[/i] Romance is dead.
I bet you’re in the perfect target demographic for a Switch Lite.
I know it’s just you and me, and we’re both mammals, but [i]please do not[/i] reenact the Discovery Channel here.
One, player?! You know you can use phones as controllers, right?! What’s the hold-up?!
I feel bad for you. I really do.
What do you want? Computer players? Ew.
Flying solo? Alright, Jason Derulo, however you want it.
Wow, this is either gonna be a very boring episode with only one contestant,[#4588#]or a very legendary episode with a lone trivia master.

Okay, so,[#1306#]we’re trying out some voice recognition software.[#3788#]Can you just say “OK, Trivia” out loud into your device?[#6867#][i](Try it out now!)[/i][#8737#]We don’t have voice recognition software. But hey, nobody’s around to make fun of you.
Just you and me? Great, nobody else to talk over me.

player_2.s: You two seem like you’re here to finally decide who’s better, mano a mano. I like that.
Two of a kind, peas in a pod, birds of a feather.[#3479#]Oh, sorry, I was thinking of the Olsen Twins. Sorry to get sidetracked.
If you’re looking for some couples bonding time,[#1963#]you’ve come to the exact opposite of the right place.
Two contestants. Let me know if you’re still friends after the show’s done.
Y’know, my grandma always said, “It takes two to make a quarrel”. And that’s so true![#4904#]If I play my cards right, you two will go home hating each other.
So which one of you evils is the lesser one?
Whichever one of you wins gets to make every decision for the rest of the day. Capisci?
Hey, Player 2, did Player 1 drag you into this?[#3439#]Feel free to upstage that sucker.
I think I can already tell who’s the Mario and who’s the Luigi, but hey,[#3834#]feel free to duke it out in this game.
Remember, you two, no hitting above the belt.[#2569#]Or at all. Trivia is a no-contact sport.
Two players, huh? Couldn’t get the third player for Quiplash, I see.
Just one thing to ask of you two:[#2173#]Please don’t Freaky Friday on me during this game, because I won’t notice.
Two players.[#1124#]Who’s the one who says “we’re not so different, you and I”,[#4162#]and who’s the one who tearfully shouts “no, we’re nothing alike”?
I’m not sure which would be sadder: if you had nobody else to invite, or if you invited other people and they all bailed.

player_3.s: Three contestants? I wonder who’s the least liked!
What, couldn’t you get a fourth player? I like the number 4.
Ooh, this harkens back to the days of hosting my local church trivia night.[#3923#]Only three people came most of the time, and I’m a satanist now.
Well well well. If you think this is gonna be anything like that irreverent trivia show from the 90s with 3 contestants...[#6366#]You’re probably right.
They say that three is a crowd. I still wouldn’t surf on you though. You look weak.
I’ll call you breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Three squares of the day.
You know, every 3-player game ends up with 2 players ganging up on the third.[#4240#]Player 2, I saw that wink. Don’t worry, I’m sure Player 1 won’t suspect a thing.
Alright, a Triforce of players! Who’s power, who’s wisdom, and who’s courage?{#4584#]I’m pretty sure wisdom has the advantage here, unless they’re too weak and cowardly to answer.
So who’s the good, who’s the bad, and who’s the ugly? Actually, never mind that last one; I think I know who the ugly is.
A lot of good things come in threes. But so do quiz show contestants. Ugh.
I’m gonna call you Curly, Larry, and Moe. ...Get it? It’s the Three Stooges.[#4951#]What do you mean, what does “stooge” mean?! Kids these days, I swear.
Seems like we have a triumvirate playing here.[#2325#]Hey, Marcus and Pompey, could you make sure nobody tries to stab Julius until the game is over? Thanks.
Hey! I’m a big fan. You guys are my favorite contestants this minute!
If you three were on the Titanic, only one of you would statistically survive. Fun fact, right?
Now everyone, look to your left, and now look to your right.[#3800#]If you saw one person in either direction, that means you’re sitting in the middle.
Keep in mind that any game smaller than 4[#2062#]will automatically have 18% gratuity subtracted from your winnings.

player_4.s: Thanks to all of you for coming in on such short notice. I invited 13 other people, but only you said yes.
Quite a party going on here, huh? Must be getting a bit less exciting, considering you whipped this game out.
Let me give you some nice little nicknames.[#2329#]Weird-nose, stupid-hair, boring-shirt...[#6294#]and I’m out of ideas.
I’ve found that, 95% of the time, Player 1 is the most hated contestant.[#4617#]Do with that information whatever you will.
So many contestants! So many things to make fun about them![#3806#]I’m so paralyzed with all these options.
If I had a dollar every time I met any of you again,[#2700#]I’d probably want to come to terms with the money I already have.

[i][sentimentally][/i] Think about it. All of you are sharing this same experience.[#5114#]All your lives intersected right here, in this beautiful moment.[#10539#][i](sniffle)[/i] I’m crying tears of joy, people.
Hey Player 1, you better not get beaten by any of your clueless friends right here.
Alright, it’s a free-for-all! Remember, no hitting below the belt,[#2845#]everybody stop when someone goes limp or unconscious,[#5178#]and if you’re here for the first time, you HAVE to fight.
Did none of you have a copy of Smash Brothers? Or did you not have enough controllers for it?
Oh nice, so many players! This will make the ad-break limbo competition a lot more fun.[#4749#]I bet Player 3 is a beast at limbo.
What a friendly group! All people who are happy to be here and ready to play.[#4370#]Except one of you. Don’t worry, that guy, I won’t tell the others.
Wow, this is way more people than Player 4’s future marriage invitees.[#4489#]Just kidding, Player 4, you won’t get married on my watch.
Did everyone put one dollar into the hat before the game starts?[#3173#]Because the only thing more fun than a casual game is mild gambling.
Everyone, remember, there’s no I in “team”,[#3077#]but there are two I’s in “competition”, which is what we’re doing here.

name_censored.s: I see what you typed. And frankly, it was funny the first 2000 times. I’m gonna give you a better name.
I thought our producers agreed to prevent kids from entering the studio. Well, now that you’re here, let me give you a real name.
You think you’re clever, huh? F**k me? F**k you. Hope you like your new name.

give_name.name: Stooge
give_name.s: Stooge. Because you’re too dumb to know what that means.

give_name.name: Jibberjabber
give_name.s: Jibberjabber. Your favorite pastime.

give_name.name: Defenestrate
give_name.s: Defenestrate. A fitting punishment for you.

give_name.name: Scrappy
give_name.s: Scrappy. Everyone’s least favorite Doo.

give_name.name: Bubsy
give_name.s: Bubsy. Because you always tell yourself, what could possibly go wrong?[#4574#]This. This is what could possibly go wrong.

give_name.name: Jack Squat
give_name.s: Jack Squat. That’s what you know.

give_name.name: Stinky
give_name.s: Stinky. Need I say more?

give_name.name: Two-Incher
give_name.s: Two-Incher. I’m told that’s an insult.

give_name.name: Lard Chugger
give_name.s: Lard Chugger. Because how else did you get that body?

give_name.name: Veal
give_name.s: Veal. Because you seem like the type of guy to keep saying “Try me, b***h”.

give_name.name: Dimwit
give_name.s: Dimwit. Now that’s a fitting name.

give_name.name: Phuc Yu
give_name.s: Phuc Yu. That’s a totally real Vietnamese name.

give_name.name: Family Guy
give_name.s: Family Guy. Because you’re crude and overrated.

give_name.name: Low-Life
give_name.s: Low-Life. Because what other kind of person sets their own name to “#@$* you” in a video game to see what the host says next?[#6095#]I’m talking to you, the player staring at this very video game screen.[#9207#]I’m some person talking alone to a microphone[#13108#]to someone I don’t know, and probably never will.

give_name.name: Screw You
give_name.s: [i]Screw[/i] You. Because think of the kids.

give_name.name: Arby’s
give_name.s: Arby’s. Because you have the meats. Where your brains should be.

give_name.name: Mariner
give_name.s: Mariner. After the Ancient Mariner with the albatross around his neck.

give_name.name: Buzz Lippman
give_name.s: Buzz Lippman. The game show host we love to hate.

give_name.name: Gene
give_name.s: Gene. The first four letters of “generic”.

give_name.name: Snowflake
give_name.s: Snowflake. Because you can’t handle the heat of this game.

give_name.name: Couch Potato
give_name.s: Couch Potato. You look like one, at least.

give_name.name: xXxSLAYERxXx
give_name.s: xXxSLAYERxXx. Because you’re so edgy it’s not even funny.

give_name.name: Matryoshka
give_name.s: Matryoshka. Because you’re so full of yourself.

give_name.name: Surströmming
give_name.s: Surströmming. Because you smell putrid.

multiple_names_censored.s: I see your lack of originality. Let me fix that up by giving you some decent names.
You sound like you’re that frat type who drinks a six-pack a day and burps at each other’s faces[#4865#]watching Frasier or Wacked Out Sports. Some new names are in order.
You want an easter egg? You get an embarrassing name each.

give_multiple_names.s: Oh, that’s much better. Let’s start the show.

all_names_censored.s: You guys, I’m not just gonna sit here and watch you pull this sh**.[#2879#]So you know what? I’m gonna take away everyone’s names and chances for a positive score.[#7465#]Because f**k you, that’s why.

lifesaver.s: You get a Lifesaver! You get a Lifesaver! Everybody gets a Lifesaver!
Everybody in the splash zone, have a Lifesaver.
But enough of that! Here’s a Lifesaver!
There are no life jackets on this flight; only Lifesavers.
I just ate all the donuts, but I do have another torus-shaped thing for you.
Having trouble staying afloat? Float back up with a Lifesaver!
Is it getting tropical in here, or is it just these Lifesavers?
You know what costs less than five cents? These complementary Lifesavers!
Have a Lifesaver! No, don’t put that in your mouth!
Before we dive into Question 1, take a Lifesaver.

lifesaver_tute0.s: If you’re unsure of the answer, press a shoulder button to eliminate two choices.
The Lifesaver will let you answer later, after two of the options are gone.

lifesaver_tute1.s: If there are other players who didn’t use a Lifesaver, you get to pick an option out of 2, after they pick an option out of 4!

lifesaver_tute2.s: You get one Lifesaver for a dozen questions, so use it strategically.

lifesaver_tute3.s: Lifesavers don't work on special question types, so keep that in mind too. Let’s get going.

intermission.s: That’s all for this round! We’ll be right back after the break.
And that’s the round! We’ll be right back after a short intermission.
You just answered 6 questions since the start of this round, which means it’s time to end this one and start a new one.
Are you satisfied with the outcome of that round? That was rhetorical, because the next one’s starting either way.

round2.s: Whoa, hey there! Didn’t see you just waiting patiently for Round 2 of Salty Trivia.
Welcome back to Salty Trivia. We’re just firing up the charcoal grill for our next batch of questions.
Hey! I hope you didn’t lose interest in Salty Trivia yet, because we’re not even halfway there![#4899#]We got a whole other round starting up.
Welcome back! It sure was fun doing some aerobics during break time. Now it’s time to exercise your brain too!
Aah. Welcome back to Salty Trivia. You have no idea how much I needed to excuse myself in that last break.[#5483#]But now I’m ready to host for at least another ten minutes!
And here, we see an elusive trivia game contestant in its natural habitat.[#4737#]They attack when provoked, and answer when quizzed!

round2_tute.s: In this round, questions are worth double. But watch out, because penalties are also worth double! Onward.
From now, questions are worth twice as much. Let’s dip our toes into this one.
This round makes all the stakes higher—twice as high, to be exact. Let’s dip our toes into this one.
I hope you didn’t forget that Round 2 has double the points, because you can’t forget what I didn’t tell you![#5224#]Well, don’t forget now!
You know what’s up with Round 2? You guessed it: point values are double! Let’s dive in.
Point values are double in Round 2, because [i]of course.[/i] Let’s get going.

lifesaver2.s: Don’t forget: you still have Lifesavers! Use them to your advantage.
C’mon, give those Lifesavers some lovin’!
Those Lifesavers aren’t gonna be here forever! Use them!
There’s a pretty clueless person in here, and that’s me, wondering why you’re not using the Lifesavers!
Remember, if your score’s underwater, you can use a Lifesaver to float back up, hopefully.
Did you forget that you had Lifesavers, or are you banking on Question 12 being the hardest?
Are you gonna use those Lifesavers, or did I go through the trouble of sourcing them and inflating them for nothing?
Hey, those Lifesavers aren’t for decoration! They serve a gameplay purpose.

lifesaver2_tute0.s: As a reminder, press a shoulder button to eliminate two options, and give yourself an easier time.
As a reminder, press a shoulder button to eliminate two options, and give yourself an easier time.
Once again, if you want to rule out a couple options from a hard question, press a shoulder button.
In case you forgot how it works, pressing either shoulder button will rule out two options, just for you.

lifesaver2_tute1.s: And they’ll be gone in six questions if you don’t use it.
Better use it quick, because if you still have it after Question 12, it’s getting confiscated.
But if you hold onto it for six more questions, we’ll take them away for good.

outro_game.s: And that's the game! Thank you for stopping by for Salty Trivia with Candy Barre.[#3741#]
There we have it![#954#]You should take the time to congratulate yourself with a pat in the back or something.[#4149#]
Game, set, and match! I do hope you enjoyed Salty Trivia with Candy Barre.[#4434#]
That's all for this game! Thanks a lot for participating in Salty Trivia with Candy Barre.[#4141#]
Well look at that, you made it through this episode without any OSHA violations![#4324#]
Let's applaud the winner of this round of Salty Trivia with Candy Barre![#4291#]
And that concludes this game of Salty Trivia with Candy Barre![#3525#]
Good job on winning Salty Trivia with Candy Barre, trivia champ![#3800#]But if you think this victory makes you a cool person,[#6816#][#7600#]well...
Congrats! By winning Salty Trivia with Candy Barre,[#2788#]you have proven that your mind is full of inconsequential minutiae.[#0615#]
That’s all for this game! Champion, hope you’re proud of yourself.[#3064#]

outro_slam.s: ’Cause I’m not gonna touch you. Back off.
I did, at least a bit.
What, you want a cookie or something?
Now give me back the hardhats and leave.
Your head is full of useless knowledge, big whoop.

cuss_a0_legacy.s: [b]Robot voice:[/b] Congratulations! You have unlocked the “fuck you” easter egg.[#4362#]Please take a look at your score to receive your prize.

cuss_a1_legacy.s: [b]Robot voice:[/b] Please note that it is discouraged for someone else to continue doing the same thing.[#4509#]You will be penalized further as a warning.

cuss_a2_legacy.s: [b]Robot voice:[/b] It is advisable that we get back to the question.

cuss_b0_legacy.s: [b]Robot voice:[/b] Congratulations for revealing the second layer of the “fuck you” easter egg![#4557#]Please take a look at your score to receive your prize.[#7935#][b]Robot voice:[/b] There is no prize, because typing in “fuck you” is no longer original.[#15886#]Please get back to the question.

cuss_c0_legacy.s: [b]Robot voice:[/b] Congratulations for discovering the only possible way that you can earn a game over.[#5176#]Please enjoy the game over screen prepared for this express purpose.

cuss_a0_daisy.s: [b]Candy:[/b] Oh, you wanna fuck me, huh? I’m not a slut, you know.[#3451#]You gotta be more sensitive, caring, romantic...[##]Yeah, I’m an expensive girl to date.[#9181#]In fact, your remark just cost you.

cuss_a1_daisy.s:
[b]Candy:[/b] Ugh, I’m gonna have to edit this out later.[#2010#][b]Daisy:[/b] I know what to do with people like you.
[b]Candy:[/b] Daisy?[#4838#][b]Daisy:[/b] You see, when you signed up for the game, I actually looked you up online.
[b]Candy:[/b] Daisy, wha—[#9263#][b]Daisy:[/b] And I found your full name on a high school publication,[#11888#][i]and[/i] found your Facebook profile from your name and your general area.[#15455#][b]Candy:[/b] [i][shocked][/i] Daisy, holy shit![#16966#][b]Daisy:[/b] And I got your email from there, and I looked you up on a password database, leaked from—[#20821#][b]Candy:[/b] Whoa, whoa, whoa! Why don’t we just change his name?[#23261#][b]Daisy:[/b] Eh, if it works for you, it’s fine by me.

cuss_a2_daisy.s: [b]Candy:[/b] Well, that should be enough of a punishment to scare you away from doing that same stupid stunt again.[#5571#]Let’s get back to the game.

cuss_b0_daisy.s:
[b]Candy:[/b] Didn’t your teacher tell you that plagiarism is wrong?[#3080#]Oh! And why not hook up with that other guy who told me that just now?[#6417#]Get a room, you disgusting stupid couple, you.[#9607#][b]Daisy:[/b] See?! I knew this wasn’t enough! Hey! Other contestant! Guess what?[#13488#][b]Candy:[/b] Daisy, no!
[b]Daisy:[/b] I also happened to try [i]your[/i] email–password combination on a bunch of other websites, and—[#18849#]Oh-ho-ho boy, I found [i]a lot[/i] of ammo.[#23358#][b]Candy:[/b] Daisy, you’re scaring me![#24493#][b]Daisy:[/b] What should I read first...?[#26763#]Embarrassing fanfiction... Cheesy poems I can only assume are to your crush...[#31847#][i](gasp)[/i] Your Amazon purchase history?![#34064#][b]Candy:[/b] We are [i]not[/i] doxxing our contestants over a swear word![#38384#][b]Candy:[/b] Both of you contestants, fuck you right back, but please change your password on... everything...[#44243#]And also, take a good, long look at your score.[#47381#][#49849#]See what I did there? Literally nothing.[#52381#]Because I’m not gonna give you the catharsis of seeing a result for your actions this time.[#57036#]How’s that for subversion of expectation, huh?[#60237#]Maybe next time you buzz in, let’s see if you can answer the fucking question.[#64589#]Ya bone-head. Let’s get back to the game.

cuss_c0_daisy.s:
[b]Candy:[/b] Good grief. When I said I wanted this game to be like You Don’t Know Jack, I didn’t mean it [i]this[/i] literally.[#5324#]But hey, you want an easter egg? I’m gonna do us all a favor and close the game.[#9945#]See you when you want to, y’know, [i]play the game?[/i][#13209#][b]Daisy:[/b] Hey, Candy! Want me to release a virus onto this last guy’s phone?
[b]Candy:[/b] [i]No![/i][#16767#][#17833#][b]Daisy:[/b] Please?

cuss_a0_miles.s: [b]Candy:[/b] Ugh. [i][shouting][/i] Miiiles! This guy’s being immature![#3538#][b]Miles:[/b] [i][disappointed][/i] Good grief. You’d think trivia game show contestants would be more well-behaved than that.[#8136#][b]Candy:[/b] Can I screw with this guy’s score?[#9600#][b]Miles:[/b] Yeah, that sounds about fair.

cuss_a1_miles.s: [b]Candy:[/b] Y’know, I’m not satisfied. Can I change this guy’s name too? Please?[#3563#][b]Miles:[/b] I mean, sure, I guess.[#5278#][b]Candy:[/b] Awesome!

cuss_a2_miles.s: [b]Miles:[/b] As long as it’s nothing too inappro—[i]CANDY?![/i][#3024#][b]Candy:[/b] What? This guy’s a prick with a limp posture![#5924#][b]Miles:[/b] ...Forget it. Just continue the question.[#8377#][b]Candy:[/b] Aye aye, captain.[#9766#][i][aside][/i] Can’t believe I got away with that.

cuss_b0_miles.s: [b]Candy:[/b] [i][sarcastically][/i] Oh great. We got another live one.[#3830#]Did you even screen these contestants, Miles?[#6117#][b]Miles:[/b] I mean, the recruitment team says they did.[#9245#]Guess I need to give them a stern talking-to and a stricter set of criteria.[#13061#][b]Candy:[/b] [i][sarcastically][/i] Sounds fun.[#14282#][b]Miles:[/b] It really isn’t.[#15264#][b]Candy:[/b] I know. And speaking of not fun,[#17550#]hey, take a look at your score there, you drunk giant panda.[#21142#][#24481#][b]Candy:[/b] You see what I did there? Nothing.[#26627#]Because clearly you’re not playing for points anyway if you saw that last point deduction,[#31243#]weighed your choices, then went ahead with flipping me off a second time.[#35872#][b]Miles:[/b] Okay, everyone, I may not sound like it,[#38299#]but I’m getting very angry at how this question’s turning out.[#41652#]Doing this a third time will have consequences.

cuss_c0_miles.s: [#500#][b]Candy:[/b] Whoop, there it is again![#2222#][b]Miles:[/b] [i][irritated][/i] Oh, for Pete’s sake. Isn’t there anyone who’s mature enough to play this game?[#6049#][b]Candy:[/b] Well, apparently not.[#7048#][b]Miles:[/b] [i][angrily][/i] You are all banned from this show forever. No appeals. You asked for this.[#11594#]You could have let me do my job and run this show, but nooo,[#14739#]you had to say those unairable words at the host three—separate—times.[#20405#][b]Candy:[/b] [i][aside][/i] Wow, this is the angriest I’ve seen Miles.[#22823#]Hey smartasses, this is your cue to feel bad.[#25269#][b]Miles:[/b] I’m done. I’m done with this episode. Shut it down.[#27696#][b]Candy:[/b] Yeah, screw these guys. I’m going home.

cuss_a0_ozzy.s:
[Candy] Oh, great. See, I told them this would happen one day.[#3153#]One day, some immature fucko would rock up and think it would be funny to flip me off.[#8448#]Well, you know what, buster? I happen to know a potty mouth who will make yours look like a kitty litter mouth.[#14491#][shouting] Hey! Ozzy! Get in here![#16990#](door opens)
[Ozzy] What do you want for me now, Candy?! I’m about to have lunch here![#20671#][Candy] That bowl of offal you call lunch can wait, Ozzy. Here, have a gander at what this player typed.[#25923#][Ozzy] What? Why should I care what one your contestants says—[#28887#][#29857#][i](uproarious laughter)[/i][#35647#][Candy] You... find this funny?[#37862#][Ozzy] Oh! That’s classic! [i](continued laughter)[/i][#41268#][Candy] You have got to be kidding me.[#42924#][Ozzy] Hey! Kiddo! [i][stumbling over words in laughter][/i] Next time, why don’t you tell her to drop her britches first [i][inaudible][/i] before saying-[#47849#][Candy] Ozzy, shut up! I dragged you here to help me punish this player, not to make them feel good about it![#52764#][Ozzy] Why not? This is the best thing that has ever happened around here! (extended laughter)[#61011#][Candy] Okay, never mind, you were useless anyway. I’ll deal with this fucker myself.[#64902#]Hey, you! Watch this!

cuss_a1_ozzy.s: [Candy] Alright, that’s that dealt with, now— Are you still laughing, you geriatric kookaburra?[#6117#][Ozzy] [i][amid laughter][/i] I haven’t had a laugh this hard in years![#8732#][Candy] Listen, if you’re not going to bother me, could you just... leave? Please?[#12782#][Ozzy] [i][gradually getting farther][/i] Oh! I needed that![#17423#](door closes) I really needed that!

cuss_a2_ozzy.s: [Candy] Okay, let’s get back to the game.[#2320#]And don’t pull that kind of trick another time, alright?[#5421#]Or else Ozzy gets it.

cuss_b0_ozzy.s:
[Candy] You’re real fucking mature, you know that? You think I’m just going to sit here and take this sort of abuse—[#5537#][i](Ozzy enters, laughing)[/i][#6834#][Candy] [i][flatly][/i] You really are finding this amusing, aren’t you.[#9534#][Ozzy] You bet I do! [i](laughter)[/i][#12613#[/i]Oh, that is peak comedy right there! Peak comedy![#17359#][Candy] Look! I don’t want you endorsing this sort of delinquency, Ozzy! We want to discourage the player from ever doing it again![#23571#][i](Ozzy continues laughing)[/i][#26883#][Candy] [i](clicks tongue)[/i] Okay. There’s only one way to fix this.[#29815#]Hey, Ozzy! You’re taking a mandatory vacation to The Bottom whether you like it or not.[#34181#][#36396#][Ozzy] (stops laughing) Wait, Bottom? What’s this about—[#39465#][i](trap door opens, Ozzy screams as he falls)[/i][#41036#][i](trap door shuts, Candy dusts her hands together as if to say “job well done”)[/i]
[Candy] Problem solved.[#43883#]Anyway, did you pay attention to your score? See anything different with it?[#47248#]That’s right, nothing. Because I don’t want this kind of crass behavior being repeated again.[#52205#]And if you don’t behave, you’re going to meet Ozzy down below![#55738#]Now, can we please get back to the fucking question?

cuss_c0_ozzy.s: [Candy] [i][without faith][/i] You know what? This is just pathetic. I don’t...[#2805#]I don’t have the time or patience to deal with a pack of two-year-old shitheads who have nothing better to do[#7298#]than come into a game and tell me to go fuck myself and—[#10314#]Actually, no, I bet it’s just one 40-year-old bastard, sitting in his mom’s basement,[#15493#]getting a boner to the sound of my voice.[#18245#]You do realize that this is all a video game, right?[#20861#]I’m just some guy named Haley, talking to a mic in a bedroom somewhere in Japan.[#25564#]Yeah, Japan. Small world, huh?[#28517#]Anyway, Candy isn’t a real person. Shit, you’d better fucking hope Candy isn’t a real person,[#33337#]not with all the shit we’ve written her to do.[#36258#]Because, if you’re actually jacking off to some sarcastically enthusiastic goth girl that you can’t even see,[#42470#]you have some serious issues, buddy.[#44464#]And you know what? I’m not going to let you finish. Game’s over.[#48081#]Come back when you’re ready to play this trivia game the way God fucking intended.[#52068#]

too_many_pauses.s: Oh, did Dr. Google give you that answer you were looking for?[#3408#]Either way, that answer’s useless now that you’re disqualified. Bye.
Great power, like stopping time, comes with great responsibility.[#4203#]Now you’re a villain.
Either someone calls you every minute, or you call Google every question.[#4252#]Either way, you sound too busy to play.
I give you a set amount of time on each question for a reason.[#4010#]Next game, try following it.
There’s no shame in being wrong, but there [i]is[/i] shame in cheating.[#4106#]Why don’t you [i]pause[/i] and think of what you’ve done?
You lose. You get nothing. Good day, sir.

skip.s: Oh, am I getting in the way? Excuuuse me.
So much to do, so little time, right?
Yeah, making sure you know, just in case.
No time to waste, let’s go! [i](clap)[/i]
Let’s start then, pro player.
Alright, down the fast lane you go.
No need to explain. Let’s begin.
Sorry, am I rambling?
Okay, cool, you remembered.
Alright, less work for me.
Good, I hate repeating myself.
Less talk, more walk. I like that.
Someone’s in a hurry today.
You get it. Same rules.
Roger that. Let’s advance.
Without further ado, let’s begin.
Yeah, you know the drill, blah blah blah.
Fine by me. I’m paid per episode.
Yeah, I’m sure you know by now.
Oh, that’s a time-saver.

skip_miles.s: Oh, alright. Just don’t ask me for help after the fact.

pretitle_q1.s: Let’s get the party started with:
Let’s get the ball rolling with:
Let’s put this into motion with:
What better way to begin, other than with this?

pretitle.s: Let’s see how you do in:
The title of this question is:
On your left hand side, you can see:

used_lifesaver.s: Now let’s get the Lifesaver users to answer.
You used your Lifesaver on this question. Now’s your chance to answer.
Enjoying the perks of your Lifesaver? Let’s see that answer.
Since Lifesavers were deployed just now, we have a couple of late answers here.
That should help you make up your mind. Courtesy of the Lifesavers.
Thank goodness for Lifesavers, amirite? Now let’s see those fingers pressing.
You’re welcome for your Lifesaver. So, what do you think is the right answer?
That should make it easier for you. Which one is it?
Out of these two left, which is right, Lifesaver user?
Hope [i]that[/i] Lifesaver was worth it. Answer now.
Now you have two options. Which is bang-on and which is bogus?
Are we gonna cut the red wire or the blue wire, over?

used_lifesaver_miles.s: And now’s the time for Lifesaver users to join back in.
And now’s the time for Lifesaver users to join back in.
That should leave just two options for Lifesaver users to pick from.
That should leave just two options for Lifesaver users to pick from.
So now that the Lifesaver removed two options, which of the remaining two is the right answer?
I’ll reveal which is the right answer after every Lifesaver user submits a guess.

reveal.s: Drum roll please... Okay, now stop.
This is the part where I correct you.

reveal_miles.s: And now we reveal the choices.

reveal_split.s: Split opinion! This is gonna be exciting!
The contestants are disagreeing! Let’s see who’s right.
We’re leaving no stone left unturned!
Oooh, I get to use all my wrong answer jokes!
Nice, all the options get picked! This is gonna take a while.
Ooh, you can tell already that at least three people are wrong here.

reveal_split_miles.s: Looks like everybody chose a different answer this time.
I’m glad the decoy answers were convincing.
We either wrote a great question, or a confusing one.
Oh, all the decoys are chosen. Let’s dive in.

reveal_jinx.s: Whoa, you guys are well coordinated.
Let’s face it: that was easy.
Great minds think alike, but fools seldom differ.
What are you, a hive mind?

reveal_jinx_miles.s: Did we make this question too easy?

reveal_crickets.s: Come on, not even a guess?
I guess that went way over your head.
I see you’re too scared of risk.
Hello? Anyone there? I’m about to reveal the right answer!
No answer. Just like my Sweet Sixteen invitations.

reveal_crickets_miles.s: I’m disappointed that you didn’t give it a shot.
Did we make it too hard? Here’s the answer.
Oh. That’s a letdown. Let me show you the solution.
I feel ignored. Would the right answer help?

reveal_correct.s: Here’s what you should have picked.
I thought it was pretty simple, but...
Let’s call it a learning moment.
You’re really making me work for my salary, aren’t ya?
Whyyy didn’t you think of this?

reveal_correct_miles.s: I’m sorry, none of you were right.

option.s: Congratulations! You’re wrong!
So wrong, yet so uninterestingly so.
Knock knock, who’s there? Wrong answer.
Good news! Nah, I’m just kidding.
That’s just sad.
I believed in you.
I’ll be taking that, thank you.
I would say I understand why you chose that, but that would be dishonest.
If only you had a second chance!
I’d love to spare you, but I’m not allowed to.
Were you thinking there?
At least you chose [i]an[/i] answer.
What’s the opposite of “winner winner chicken dinner”? “You you beef stew”?
Contrary to popular be—Wait, never mind, I thought you chose a different one.
Hold on, let me check again.[#1985#]Hm. Mmhm.[#3460#]Still not correct.
Hi, it’s Candy, just checking on that answer again.[#2299#][#3756#]Uh huh, thanks.[#5300#]Wrong answer.
To quote Shakespeare’s [i]Hamlet,[/i] Act 3, Scene 2, Line 176:[#5230#]“No, no”.
Your mind must have 404’d.
Roll for intelligence...[#1759#][#2461#]1.
Now, you can’t go bankrupt on this game, but I [i]will[/i] punish you.
I mean, I didn’t expect much from you, but holy hell.
Yikety yike, Christ on a bike.
Careful. Your dumb is showing.
Thaaat’s embarrassing. For you.
I thought so at first, but then I knew better.
[i](beat)[/i][#1445#]Wow, even the crickets are speechless.
[i](beat)[/i][#1440#]Y’know, I can’t even make fun of that.
What do you want, a cookie?
Really? You picked [i]that?![/i]
Look at me. Look right at me.[#2432#]Wait, sh**, you can’t.
I sure hope you didn’t pick that answer sober.
Ooo, that’s gotta hurt.
[i](laughs)[/i][#1863#][i](beat)[/i][#2682#]You serious?
Please do better next time.
[i][in British accent][/i] Oh! You’ve been Wangernumbed!
Don’t quit your day job.
If you’re good at it, don’t do it for free.[#1869#]If you’re bad at it, it’s probably trivia.
Hindsight really is 20/20, isn’t it?

So I have good news and bad news.[#1800#]The bad news is there’s no good news, and the good news is,[#4818#]I don’t even know where I’m going with this,[#6136#]so let’s just reel it back in and say you’re wrong.
That’s gotta be the correct answer for some other question.
Hell yeah! That’s what I’m talking about when I say that’s wrong![#3222#][#3617#][i](chuckles)[/i] This is dumb.
[i](sound of crickets)[/i]
[i](laugh track) (applause)[/i]

option_miles.s: Man, how does Candy come up with all that?
Hey, Daisy, can you play that sad trombone effect we have?[#3208#][i](sad trombone effect)[/i][#5241#]Thanks.

gib_early.s: Hey, did your finger slip onto the buzzer?
You went for the big money, and big money is what you lost.[#3228#]Tough break, kid.
Maybe if you waited for a clue, you might have come up with something decent.
Maybe next time, don’t move fast and break things.

gib_wrong.s: I don’t know what that is, but that’s not it.
I’d say I understand why you typed that in, but that would be dishonest.
I’m not gonna judge, maybe it rhymes in your accent.[#2566#][#3158#]I lied. That was dumb.

gib_late.s: Three clues, and you [i]still[/i] got it wrong? Unreal.
I gave you all the clues! What do you want from me?
Oh, for crying out loud, you had all the time and clues you needed! How do you not get it?
Took you long enough.[#1242#][#1858#]To be wrong.

gib_blank.s: Hm, interesting. Very minimalist.[#2589#]Hey, let me help you minimize that score there.
I said “give me a rhyming phrase”,[#1416#]not “give me a detailed look into what little is going on in your head”.
Uh, did your keyboard break, or did you genuinely have no idea?

sort_segue.s: And this one’s a Sorta Kinda!
Get [i]definitely[/i] ready for this Sorta Kinda!
Ready for instant decision-making? You’ll need it for this!
Strap on for a Sorta Kinda!

sort_category_names.s: I’m going to list seven names.

sort_category_ingredients.s: I’m going to list seven ingredients.

sort_explain.s: And for each of them, I need you to tell me if it’s:
And for each of them, I need you to tell me if it’s:
For each of them, you gotta tell me if it’s:
And I wanna hear whether each of them is:

sort_press_up.s: And as usual, press [i]Up[/i] if it’s both.
If it’s both of them, you gotta press [i]Up.[/i]
But if both of them are right, press [i]Up.[/i]

sort_lifesaver.s: Oh, and you won’t have enough time to use a Lifesaver here. Let’s go.
Oh, and you won’t have enough time to use a Lifesaver here. Let’s go.
Also, don’t even bother trying to use a Lifesaver on this one. Let’s rock.
Remember that there’s no Lifesaving on a Sorta Kinda. Here we go!
One last rule: You can’t use a Lifesaver. Let’s sort.

gib_tute0.s: I’m gonna give you a silly phrase, whose syllables rhyme with another, more popular phrase.[#4518#]Buzz in and type the answer as soon as you know what it is.

gib_tute1.s: Though, as a disclaimer: even though the answer rhymes in my accent,[#3158#]the answer might not perfectly rhyme, or rhyme at all in yours.[#6673#]Don’t @ me.

gib_tute2.s: If you’re stumped, I’ll drip-feed you up to three clues every quarter of the way.

gib_tute3.s: But every half a second, the value of the question will go down,[#2863#]so you should buzz in as soon as you know it.

gib_tute4.s: Put your rhyming cap on and tell me...

gib_genre_catchphrase.s: With what [i]catch phrase[/i] does this rhyme?

gib_genre_meme.s: With what [i]Internet meme[/i] does this rhyme?

gib_genre_song.s: With what [i]song title[/i] does this rhyme?

gib_genre_trope.s: With what [i]TV Trope[/i] does this rhyme?

gib_genre_videogame.s: With what [i]video game title[/i] does this rhyme?

thou_segue.s: And oh my goodness, it’s a Thousand-Question Question!
And can you believe it? It’s a Thousand-Question Question!
Brace yourselves, this one’s a Thousand-Question Question!
And oh! There’s big money at stake here; it’s a Thousand-Question Question!
And now’s your chance! It’s a Thousand-Question Question!

thou_tute0.s: This question’s worth a whopping thousand times more than a normal question.
And that means it’s worth as much as a thousand other questions.
We call it the Thousand-Question Question, because a thousand times the winnings are at stake.

thou_tute1.s: But the prize money goes down the longer it takes to answer.
But as the clock keeps ticking, the value also keeps decreasing if you don’t answer.
But the longer you take to answer, the less money you can make.

thou_tute2.s: And since we can’t just give away big money to everyone, only the first person to answer it will win the prize.
And you better act fast, because only the first contestant to get it right will be rewarded.
And we’ll close it as soon as anyone gets the right answer, so get your right answers in ASAP.

thou_intro.s: On your mark, get set, start the clock!
Alright, are you ready? Start the clock!

like_intro.s: Welcome to Like It or Leave It!

like_tute0.s: For each of the 5 sections, Like the options that match the description, but Leave everything else.

like_tute1.s: The first 3 items stay the same, but the 4th item changes every section.

like_ready.s: Get ready to make some connections!
Let’s see who has the best taste.

like_outro.s: That’s all five! Let’s see how it affected your final score.
That’s enough social media time. Who’s on top at the end?
That’s the end of the game! Now for the final scoreboard.

rush_intro.s: You’ve made it to the Sugar Rush.
Brace yourselves for the Sugar Rush.

rush_tute0.s: For each of the six sections, select only the options that match that description.

rush_tute1.s: 1 point gained for each right answer or omission.

rush_tute2.s: But 1 point lost for each wrong answer or omission.

rush_tute3.s: Only choose matches that fit this topic:

rush_ready.s: I’ll see you on the other side.
We’ll meet again on the other side.
Let’s hope you’ll make it through to the other side.
And don’t let the Rush hit you while you’re down.
Will you feel the Rush, or will you feel the crush?

rush_skip.s: Oh, am I getting in the way? Excuuuse me.
Well, if you insist. Here’s the topic.
Oh, by all means. Just remember this.
Ah, you’ve been here before, I take it. Here’s the topic.
A little jumpy, are we? I’ll give you the topic.
Well then, just don’t blame me if you get confused.
No need for guidance, I see. Here’s your topic.

buzz_in.s: I see you, I see you.
Okay, what are you thinking of?
What do you have for me?
